channel.title: Players cant log out while fighting?
channel.description:
whats the code so that players cant log out until 10 seconds after fighting,
also is there a away so when people close there client that they die when fighting? cuz it wouldnt be fair if someone was about to win and the other player closed his client and got logged out safely.

item.title: Players cant log out while fighting?
item.dc:creator: @bhpkyeah satesql
item.source: Players cant log out while fighting?
